title: The Frugal Gourmet Cooks Italian: Recipes from the New and Old Worlds, Simplified for the American Kitchen
description: The popular television chef offers more than four hundred recipes, from gnocchi to polenta, in an anecdotal evocation of Italian cuisine. TV tie-in. 300,000 first printing. $250,000 ad/promo. BH&G & BOMC/HomeStyle Main. Tour.
author: Jeff  Smith
